availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on March 31, 1812 in Shelby County. Saddler and farmer. Native of Shelby County. Apprenticed to a saddler in 1828. Married to Parmelia W. Denny on March 14, 1838. They had six children including Cyrus, Hester, Martha, Dorothea, Otho and Lydia E. Died on June 13, 1871.

bibl.p: Weston A. Goodspeed, Leroy C. Goodspeed, Charles L. Goodspeed, History of Lawrence, Orange and Washington Counties, Indiana From the Earliest Time to the Present; Together with Interesting Biographical Sketches, Reminiscences, Notes, Etc. (Chicago, Goodspeed Bros., & Co.,Publishers, 1884).
